codelibDesc: Code Repositories service can link your existed SVN and GIT repositories to CI，which will be a pipeline's materials
noPermissionDesc: You do not have the permission for create, please switch the project or apply for permission accordingly
gitCredPlaceholder: Please select crendential of SSH private key+private Token
gitlabCredPlaceholder: Please select credential of type AccessToken
svnSshRule: Start by svn+ssh:// and the correct one
gitlabSshRule: Start by git@ and end with .git
httpRule: Start by http:// or svn:// and the correct one
httpsRule: Start by https:// and end with .git
httpOrHttpsRule: Start by http:// or https:// and end with .git
portTips: The name of the machine hosting the shared version control service, TCP/IP and PORT must be specified.If using SSL to connect to P4, use ssl:host:port
tgitHttpRule: Start by https:// and end with .git
tgitRule: Start by git@ and end with .git
creator: Creator
pacTips: Pipeline As Code 模式下，使用代码库 .ci 目录下的 YAML 文件编排流水线，且 YAML 文件变更将自动同步到对应的蓝盾流水线。
可以尝试 调整关键词 或: You can try adjusting keywords or
确认离开当前页？: Are you sure to leave now?
离开将会导致未保存信息丢失: Your changes will be lost if you close without saving.
如需重置，请先点击按钮授权。: If need to reset, please authorize first.
尚未授权，请先点击按钮授权。: Not yet authorized, please authorize first.
此授权用于平台和工蜂进行交互，用于如下场景：: This authorization is applicable in the following scenarios:
回写提交检测状态到工蜂: Writing back commit check status to TGit
需拥有代码库 Devloper 及以上权限，建议使用公共账号授权: Developer or higher permissions is required, and it is recommended to use a public account for authorization.
此授权用于平台和 Github 进行交互，用于如下场景：: This authorization is applicable in the following scenarios:
回写 Commit statuses 到 Github: Writing back commit check status to Github
此授权用于平台和 SVN 代码库进行交互，用于如下场景：: This authorization is applicable in the following scenarios:
注册 Webhook 到代码库: Register the webhook to the repository
需拥有代码库 Write 权限: Requires Write permission on the repository
此授权用于平台和 P4 代码库进行交互，用于如下场景：: This authorization is applicable in the following scenarios:
同一个代码库可以关联到多个蓝盾项目，但仅支持在一个蓝盾项目下开启 PAC (Pi: The same repository can be associated with multiple BlueKing projects, but only supports PAC (Pipeline As Code) mode under one BlueKing project.
PAC 模式下，使用代码库 ci 目录下的 YAML 文件编排流水线，且 YAM: In PAC mode, the YAML file in the ci directory of the repository is used to arrange the pipeline, and YAML file changes will be automatically synchronized to the corresponding Blue Shield pipeline.
当前代码库已在【】项目中开启 PAC 模式: The repository has enabled PAC mode in the project [{0}]
检测到默认分支仍存在ci 文件目录，关闭 PAC 模式后该目录下的文件修改将: It is detected that the default branch still exists in the .ci file directory. After turning off PAC mode, the file modifications in this directory will
不再同步到蓝盾流水线: No longer in sync to BlueKing Pipeline
后重试，避免项目其他成员进行无效的YAML文件修改: the directory and try again to avoid invalid YAML file modifications by other project members.
ci目录已改名或删除: The .ci directory has been renamed or deleted
确定重置授权为 OAUTH，同时开启 PAC 模式吗？: Reset authorization to OAUTH and enable PAC mode?
以下流水线仍在使用此代码库: The following pipelines are still using this repository
请前往流水线处理后，再删除代码库: Please go to the pipeline for processing before deleting the repository.
触发器类型/事件类型/触发人/流水线名称: Trigger Type / Event Type / Trigger / Pipeline Name
确认以此事件重新触发流水线 X 吗？: 确认以此事件重新触发流水线[{0}]吗？
满足基础过滤条件后，根据第三方接口返回判断是否能够触发: After meeting the basic filter conditions, judge whether it can be triggered according to the return of the third-party interface
将使用此事件重新触发关联的流水线: Will be re-trigger the associated pipeline by this event.
确认以此事件重新触发流水线X吗？: Re-trigger the pipeline [{0}] with this event？
重置授权会使正在运行的流水线中已获取到的授权信息失效，从而导致执行失败，请谨慎操: Caution: Resetting authorization may cause running pipelines to fail.
无该代码库权限: No permission for this code repository
你没有该代码库的查看权限，请申请权限: You do not have permission to view this code repository, please apply for permission
该代码库不存在，请切换代码库: This code repository does not exist, please switch to another code repository
